pluginstrument.author: Jack Zero
pluginstrument.description:
Pedestal for Ddenn's Challenger 300, meant to be used on a touchscreen or iPad.The layout is optimized for a aspec ratio of 4:3 and a resolution of 2048x1536 or 1024x768 (e.g. old 15" touchscreens). It will only work with the latest version of the Challenger (10.31 for X-Plane 10.31) since the names of all custom dataref where changed in the update.
Several features of the panels (zoomable panels, invisible cursors, etc) can be configured via global variables (ZOOMABLE, ALLOW_REVERSE, NOCURSOR) which are defined and documented in the first 20+ lines of the code. For more details on the used panel-library, see http://forums.x-plane.org/index.php?showtopic=85916.
